trans-unit.source: Specifies that a class is a contract for a type.
trans-unit.target: 指定類別為類型的合約。

trans-unit.source: Types that are marked with this attribute represent a code contract for another type.
trans-unit.target: 標示了這個屬性的型別代表另一種類型的程式碼合約。

trans-unit.source: The type that the contract applies to is specified in the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 適用於合約的型別建構函式中指定。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractClassForAttribute> attribute to specify the contracts for another type.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractClassForAttribute>屬性來指定另一種類型的合約。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractClassAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractClassAttribute>類別。

trans-unit.source: The type the current class is a contract for.
trans-unit.target: 目前類別為其合約的型別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractClassForAttribute" /> class, specifying the type the current class is a contract for.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractClassForAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體，指定目前類別為其合約的型別。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractClassAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor to specify that the contracts in the type apply to the `IArray` interface.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractClassAttribute.%23ctor%2A>建構函式可指定的合約型別中套用至`IArray`介面。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractClassAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.ContractClassAttribute>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type that this code contract applies to.
trans-unit.target: 取得型別，即其中要套用此程式碼合約的型別。

trans-unit.source: The type that this contract applies to.
trans-unit.target: 其中要套用此程式碼合約的型別。
